text: I have a friend who moved to Portland recently with his wife to be closer to family, he's currently working remotely doing operations/PM work for an aerospace engineering firm in California but is looking for something in this area. If anyone is aware of any companies locally that might meet be in a similar space (sorry for the pun) he'd love to hear about them.
He's not tied to aerospace by any means but something engineering related and smaller is sort of his ideal
They had contracts with JPL, etc. so I figured it's sufficiently nerdy
<https://www.ogsystems.com> acquired Urban Robotics (a startup in Old Town) a couple years ago, no idea if they're hiring in this area tho

attachments.text: OGSystems(OGS) is specialized in GEOINT (Geospatial intelligence), DoD (Department of Defense), Immersive Engineering, Data Analysis, Agile Engineering and  systems development, integration
attachments.fallback: OGSystems(OGS) is specialized in GEOINT (Geospatial intelligence), DoD (Department of Defense), Immersive Engineering, Data Analysis, Agile Engineering and  systems development, integration

text: Cognex also has an office in the area, I used to know someone who worked there.
Thanks Marissa! I'll pass the info along
